data.name: Undead Awakening
data.detailed_description:
Undead Awakening is a Co-Op zombie fps game where you fight waves of zombies alone or with your team as it gets progressively harder.
There is also an PvP online multiplayer mode where you fight in teams against each other.
Help us fight as the undead!
data.about_the_game:
Undead Awakening is a Co-Op zombie fps game where you fight waves of zombies alone or with your team as it gets progressively harder.
There is also an PvP online multiplayer mode where you fight in teams against each other.
Help us fight as the undead!
data.short_description: This is a First Person Shooter game. Where survive waves of zombies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-Bit) or higher
  • Processor: Core i5-2400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gt 710
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-4670
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gtx 1050 ti or RX 560 (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Core i5-2400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gt 710
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Core i5-4670
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gtx 1050 ti or RX 560 (4GB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains gore and blood.
